```{r}
#| label: lm-1
#| echo: false

m <- lm (dist ~ speed, data = cars)
sm <- summary(m)
```


This analysis was performed using a general linear model. The model shows an adjusted R-squared of `r round(sm$adj.r.squared, 2)` (rounded). 

These results supported our hypotheses with a p-value of `r sm$coefficients[1,4]`.
